mean_cn: adj. 不顾的，不注意的；  adv. 不顾一切地，无论如何
mean_en: in spite of difficulty, trouble, etc. ; without being stopped by difficulty, trouble, etc.
word_etyma: regard注意+less表形容词，无...的 →不注意的
short_phrase: they kiss, regardless of the child
sentence: The couple kissed regardless of the fact that the kid was watching.
sentence_trans: 这对情侣亲吻的时候，完全不顾有个孩子正在看着（他们）。
